piefaosItemRow.piefaosDescription: Assets in the PEOPLE category can include but are not limited to U.S. citizens, foreign nationals, employees, subject matter experts (SMEs), contractors, or visitors.
Both classified and unclassified, INFORMATION assets are those pieces of program data or proprietary information that enable the organization to perform.
The EQUIPMENT category includes all the physical hardware weapons, computers, and product.
Commercial buildings, secured sites, bases, and airfields where work is performed are all included in the FACILITIES/INFRASTRUCTURE category.
ACTIVITIES are the small stuff we care about.
OPERATIONS are the other stuff you do.
Where do you get that stuff?
